alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 05 at 9:05AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Potential Flooding Tonight through Friday... Widespread showers and isolated thunderstorms will overspread the area later this afternoon and evening, with moderate to heavy rain through Friday evening. Storm totals of 0.50 to 1.50 inches will be common, and isolated higher amounts are possible. Due to a lack of vegetation this early in the growing season, runoff from this amount of rainfall could lead to flooding of low-lying and flood prone areas, as well as streams and creeks. Ponding on roads is also likely. Larger rivers could then respond with minor flooding this weekend. Areas that observed heavy rainfall Tuesday will be particularly susceptible to flooding, including northeast Indiana into northwest Ohio. If you live in areas prone to flooding, monitor the latest forecasts and statements, including possible flood watches and warnings.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph
